name: Payload: Ouroboros
description:
'Captain! The cursed payload Ouroboros is within our grasp...'

- As the salvager SS Clark, join with the cursed payload Ouroboros and ferry it to the buoy.

- Navigate treacherous waters. If the Ouroboros goes down - you go down with it. 

- Dodge the Ouroboros' deadly projectiles - use them to forge paths through environmental hazards and enemies (not implemented).

- Atmospheric art direction and sound design.

Cheers from Team Noa!
